name: MCP Benchmarking for Small Language Models (SLMs)
para: Researching a task-completion benchmark for Model Context Protocol (MCP) agents powered by SLMs, advised by Prof. Fraida Fund (NYU). The benchmark evaluates tool-augmented agents across multi-step tasks with human-annotated action traces, measuring success rate, latency, tool-call efficiency, and cost. Includes a reproducible harness, datasets with step-by-step ground truth, and a web dashboard for run comparisons.

name: Spotify Buddies â€” Full ML Pipeline for Playlist Recommender
para: Full-stack ML system recommending organic user-created playlists based on taste similarity, using a dual-model architecture: user pairing via KNN and playlist ranking via Bayesian Personalized Ranking (BPR). Experiments tracked with MLflow and HPO via Ray; CI/CD on Kubernetes with Docker, Prometheus, and FastAPI for serving, load-testing, and degradation monitoring.

name: LoRa with RoBERTa on AG-News dataset
para: Fine-tuned a <1M parameters RoBERTa model with LoRa on the AG-News dataset, using domain adaptation data augmentation. My submission was ranked top 1 on a Kaggle competition that had +400 participants.

name: ResNet on CIFAR-10 dataset
para: Trained a ResNet with the restriction of <5 million parameters on the CIFAR-10 dataset, achieving 96% test accuracy.

name: Robot Arm Kinematics Simulator
para: This project simulates the kinematics of a 6-DOF robotic arm such as the UR-5 robot.

name: ML Projects at NYU
para: Designed and trained over 20 ML models including regressors, classifiers, ensembles, neural networks, reinforcement learning, and self-supervised learning. Additionally, I've conducted several experiments on MLOps involving cloud, scalable training, deployment, and monitoring.

name: Certify
para: Developed a Yelp-like web application for car listings featuring image uploads, geolocation clustering, search filters, user authentication, and reviews. Built REST APIs, implemented authorization, and deployed with production-ready tools.
